WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is fixed in r48211.  There may be other items, notably trinkets and rings with proc'd or use effects, that may not be showing up, so if you see them, please report them as issues and I'll fix em up.
WorkItem.Description:
Since the latest version, Val'anyr, Hammer of Ancient Kings,  has disappeared from the Main hand slot.
I checked an older version I had on hand (2.3.10 and it was there by default, 2.3.12 it is not)
 
Any get upgrades from armory or wow do not bring it back in.
Adding the its item-id 46017 shows it in the add item, but it still doesn't show up in the drop down.
 
Am I doing something wrong?
 
Cheers
WorkItem.Summary: Val'anyr, Hammer of Ancient Kings removed from items
